stimulusHtml: A researcher conducts a study to test conformity. The researcher recruits participants and asks them to observe line X and line Y, where line X is clearly shorter than line Y. Which of the following procedures would be most effective to test conformity?
choicesHtml: Use nine confederates and one participant. The nine confederates go first and correctly say that line Y is longer.
Use one confederate and nine participants. The one confederate goes first and correctly says that line Y is longer.
Use one confederate and nine participants. The one confederate goes first and incorrectly says that line X is longer.
Use nine confederates and one participant. The nine confederates go first and incorrectly say that line X is longer.
